features: Effortless Beauty: Experience the allure of Jerome Alexander Airbrush Foundation. This makeup foundation offers an ultra-light, buildable, full-coverage formula that creates a flawless and silky-smooth finish, making you feel effortlessly beautiful every day.

Microfine Mist Technology: Embrace picture-perfect, natural matte skin with our spray on makeup airbrush makeup foundation. The microfine mist technology of this airbrush flawless foundation ensures even, non-streaky coverage that lasts all day, giving you a radiant and flawless look in just seconds. This airbrush kit includes a kabuki foundation brush for seamless application.

Skincare-Infused: Unlock the secret to glowing, healthy skin with our MagicMinerals Airbrush Foundation Spray enriched with a proprietary blend of skincare actives. Hyaluronic Acid, Argireline, and Matrixyl 3000 work their magic, nourishing, hydrating, and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Sweat-Proof and Humidity Resistant: Don't let the day's challenges dull your radiance. Our sweat-proof, humidity-resistant, and breathable foundation spray makeup foundation keeps you looking fresh and radiant, no matter what the weather brings.

Flawless Coverage, Weightless Feel: Revel in the beauty of full coverage without the weight. Our foundation full coverage allows you to control your desired coverage without excess oil, revealing a naturally radiant and youthful complexion that feels as light as air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is truly the best foundation in all respects!
reviews.reviewText: First off let me share with you: I am a retired Executive for the largest food & drink sector in the world, thus I am a stickler regarding exceptional quality in the products I use. I am also a self taught “amateur” skin, makeup, hair & beauty artist of over 5 decades, thus I only utilize exceptional quality products on my face, body & hair. This product is literally everything you’d want in a foundation; as it is lightweight, moisturizing, it covers most imperfections efficiently, it doesn’t have a lingering fragrance, it doesn’t settle into pores, fine lines or wrinkles, it has all day staying power, (8-12 hours), the price is very competitive, & it lasts much longer, (I purchase every 2 months on average), than most foundation’s! What more could a lady ask for in a full coverage foundation? This foundation is a spray, yet with all products you must know “how to use them” in order for them to do what they were created to for you, right? My Instructions: take an empty toilet paper cardboard, (YES I SAID TOILET PAPER CARDBOARD 😉), place your foundation brush inside it, be sure that the brush side is down into the toilet paper roll aprox. 2” & then shake your foundation to mix it for aprox. 10 seconds & spray into the toilet paper roll hitting the top of your foundation brush, covering it with a light coat of foundation. “Voila” no mess, no wasted makeup & all the foundation ends up on your foundation brush where it’s supposed to be! Hints: if you’re a finely aged lady like I am, wet your foundation brush with a little warm water prior to spraying foundation into the brush ,(as described above). After spraying foundation on warmly dampened brush apply to face gently. When applying to pores, line lines &/or wrinkles take a different makeup brush, (small flatter brush) & rub it over your used foundation brush, (that you just applied foundation to your face with). Now, continuously dap this brush into fine lines, pores & wrinkles until covered as best as possible. Remember aged ladies, like me: nothing will make these imperfections disappear short of surgery; however you can cover them with my techniques above pretty darn well! Do not use a powder to set this foundation, because all powders will settle into the above mentioned imperfections &/or give your foundation the appearance of a caked texture.[You can however use a light dusting of a rice powder on any shiny areas only, if you’d like]. Instead: wait for several minutes after applying foundation for it to dry as much as possible. Now, lightly spray all areas that you applied foundation to, (your face, neck & decollate), & hold your face in front of a fan for 10 seconds until all areas are dry. Repeat setting spray method once more. You’re all set!! Your makeup will look flawless, it won’t transfer, (unless you’re being careless, & you know what I mean Girlfriends 😉), & it’ll last for 8-12 hours, even if you go out & dance the tiles off the dance floor!! Yes, even as a Grandma of 7 I still do this myself occasionally! 👍 I’ve been using this foundation with my techniques for 2 years now, after spending 100’s of $’s on less effective foundations for many decades. This is “THE FOUNDATION” that all aged woman should use as the most effective, efficient, effortless foundation makeup ever‼️. PS: I wasn’t paid to write this review, I’m not affiliated in any way with the foundation creator, nor with Amazon. But what I am is a woman who strongly believes in sharing my secrets with other women. I believe in uplifting all women I encounter; as “we’ve come a long way baby”, & we’ll go so much farther in this life if we support one another along the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This foundation actually surprised me. It went on so perfectly, I almost looked different. What's even more surprising is that when I wear it, I get compliments on my skin. It goes on smoothly, and covers what you need covered. Stays on pretty much all day, and honestly, you WILL see a difference. I use Medium, and it does lighten my skin a little, but it still looks good. I think it's worth a try if you love makeup like I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have severe Rosacea on my checks, and finding foundation that covers it is a challenge. After reading the reviews for this particular foundation, I decided to give it a try. I am shocked at how well this works! It instantly covered my way too pink cheeks, I just can't believe it! Also, it goes on very smoothly, and it has made my skin feel so good. I am a month shy of 65 (gasp!), if that helps give you an idea of what might work for you. This foundation has my vote! Others have commented that the brush was poor quality, and it did lose a bristle when I used it, but I really like it. It's so soft, and has a nice wide surface so when you spray the makeup on it, it catches all of the spray. I haven't tried spraying the makeup directly on my face; I don't think that's such a good idea! Regardless, in my opinion, this is a wonderful foundation, and is justvery reasonably priced. It's definitely worth a try! I received some other foundation for Christmas from my daughter, and it is quite expensive. While it is nice, it didn't cover my Rosacea at all, not even when I used concealer first and then applied setting powder. The redness was still shining through. This makeup covered it with one application with no concealer or setting powder used! In my book that's a WIN!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved how flawlessly this went on. It had a nice cool temperature to it as well. I ordered the light medium. Going to exchange it for a tad darker. Warm medium. But it feels great on. Goes on light but has amazing coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am genuinely surprised-
reviews.reviewText: I’d read a review of this product on a news feed. I have been curious about air brushing makeup. I did not understand how it would work. The price was reasonable enough to make me want to try it. I am finding as I age- the tinted Bb cream I have been using is fine for the hot weather but does not work as well in the cold drier weather.I ordered the palest color as I am very fair skinned. There are 2 choices - the color desired and then a “bright” version. While I do not know the difference between the regular and bright- I chose the bright to give my 70 year old skin a bit of brightness if that’s what it did.I have worn this everyday for a week. The makeup comes in a spray can and the product is sprayed on a lush- soft - thick brush. It goes on easily and actually quite nicely. It’s not heavy like the powder in a compact. The coverage is surprisingly even and smooth. It doesn’t crack or dry out during the days wear and so far has not required any touch up. I expected to need that. So it was a great surprise to not have to.I like the color- it does have a brightness to it but not glittery. It also has no particular odor - which is very nice. I am surprised at how nice and smooth my skin looks wearing it. It comes off easily at the end of the day with soap and water or make up remover cloth.I am delighted with the product- with the application method and the wonderful application brush. I love how it looks on me. No one is more surprised than me.I will buy this again
